body.name: GNCC Outdoor Camera, 2K Cameras for Home Security Outside, Home Security Cameras, Motion Detection, Night Vision, 24/7 Recording, 2 Way Audio, Waterproof, Cloud & Local, Plug-in, APP Control
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 50 mins
features: 2K Sufficiently Clear Footage: Experience uninterrupted 2K sufficiently clear footage with GNCC GT1Pro security camera day and even night

APP Control: Experience seamless control with the Osaio APP, developed by GNCC, allowing you to efficiently manage this WiFi camera with features like motion/sound/AI detection, night vision, 2 way audio, 24/7 recording, alarm siren, cloud and local storage etc

Get Rid of the Hassle of Manual Charging: Paired with a 3-meter power cord included, no need to take this wired security camera off midway to charge, the plug-in power supply enables you to have uninterrupted 24/7 recording
Free 24/7 Recording to Local MicroSD Card: Insert a MicroSD card for 24/7 local recording and playback in the Osaio App (supports up to 128GB, MicroSD card not included)

Unlimited Cloud Storage and AI Detection: Enjoy unlimited cloud storage and never worry about running out of storage space, you can choose to only get alerts for person, vehicle, animal, or package detection (need to subscription)

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: HD Resolution, Night Vision, Motion Sensor, Local Recording, 2-Way Audio, Cry Detection, Sound Triggered Recording, Portable, Cloud/Local Storage See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Do I have to keep the security camera plugged in at all time? Yes. What is the length of the power cord? About 9.8 ft (3M). Does it require a 5G Wi-Fi connection? No, it currently only uses a 2.4G Wi-Fi connection and does not support 5G Wi-Fi. Does this security camera support multiple accounts to view at the same time? Yes, just set it up in the camera settings and share it with whoever you want! (You cannot log into the same account on different devices.) How to realize cloud storage and local storage? You can purchase cloud storage on Osaio APP according to your needs, and you need to purchase Micro SD card (up to 128GB) separately for local storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great clear images
reviews.reviewText: This camera is awesome and works great for a very reasonable price.Why pay more. Easy set up. Very light weight so installation can be done anywhere. If there is an issue, customer service answers your questions very quickly. Night vision makes the camera worth it all.I now own 4 of this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good security camera
reviews.reviewText: This camera works amazingly.I got two for both of my properties. and I was always worrying about my package getting taken of my property.but this camera has made it easier for me to see who comes and goes.and not only does it give me full view of my property it also shows me the full view of my Street .so I’m able to see my brothers getting on their bus for school.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Skip buying this one
reviews.reviewText: The only thing about this camera was how easy it was to mount on the side of my house. The camera will not connect via the app. However, per the manual and the description on here/Amazon you are suppose to be able to record 24/7 by just having an SD card inserted into the camera. This camera is not worth the money. All I needed was something to record 24/7 using an SD card but this camera will not even do that. I have contacted customer service support via email because that is the only method available. I received a response asking what the problem was despite my original email giving a detailed information about my problem. I responded back with the same information and I have yet to receive any solution from the company. You might as well say there is NO customer support for this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works for what we need it for
reviews.reviewText: Not a top of the line camera, by any means, but it works great for what we need it for, which is monitoring what our watch dog is always barking at. (Turns out, it's deer in the yard that he's barking at.) The picture is pretty clear and the motion sensor works well. It does have to be plugged in, and you need a Micro SD card unless you wan to pay for the Cloud service. Otherwise, it's a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The value for what you get
reviews.reviewText: There's actually nothing to dislike about this product in my view, it is built very well, it can be used without a subscription and has been perfectly reliable for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have three of these cameras half of the time the motion sensor does not go off It don’t pick anything up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear viewing, everything in one unit.
reviews.reviewText: Clear viewing, everything in one unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Facili da installare e ottima risoluzione.

Działa całkiem w porządku, jakość obrazu, szczególnie w nocy za tę cenę super. Jednak po czasie pojawił się problem z nagrywaniem na kartę sd, ciągle pojawiają się uszkodzone nagrania, bądź w ogóle nie nagrywa mimo ustawienia nagrywania 24/7. Mimo formatu karty sd, mimo przywrócenia do ustawień fabrycznych

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality, amazing value. Night visio. I am ever so pleased. Very easy to install, steps explained in an easy way so everyone can fallow instructions. I am so happy with the purchase and the quality is amazing. Wasn't expecting such a good video quality for day and night.Thank you i am highly recommending this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Kompatibilität und Qualität für kleines Geld.
reviews.reviewText: Für mich absolut super nicht nur das die Kamera nicht viel gekostet hat, super Qualität und das wichtigste für mich sie ist kompatibel mit FritzBox LTE was viele Kameras nicht können. Ich nehme mein mobilen Internet und meine Kameras mit und benutze wo ich will da die mit 5V USB überall anzuschließen sind.

Compre la cámara para la entrada de casa, la visión es muy nítida incluso por la noche ademas de un buen angulo, tienes la opción de poner una tarjeta y que todo quede grabado en ella, o la misma empresa por un precio razonable sube la grabación a la nube, también tienes comunicación recíproca movil-camara. Para mí ,la calidad y el precio se ajustan bastante bien, sobretodo si la comparamos con otras marcas. Es una buena opción y compraré otra seguramente.
